thread.title: Hurricane Patricia Will Affect People And Places That I know | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: Hurricane Patricia Will Affect People And Places That I know | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Hurricane Patricia Will Affect People And Places That I know | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Many will be killed or destroyed.
Mrs22 and I have spent much of the last nineteen years in Mexico. Hurricane Patricia is going to destroy an awful lot of what is known as the ‘Mexican Riviera’. The area extends from San Blas in the north to Acapulco in the south. In the middle of all that is the area around Puerto Vallarta and Manzanillo. Manzanillo is where the Las Hadas resort is where the movie 10 with Bo Derek was filmed.
Hurricane Patricia will destroy places that we have visited and whose memories we love. Because this storm is so powerful the Las Hadas resort will be severely damaged.
This is an El Nino year like the first year we spent in Mexico. That year hurricane Linda threatened but did not come our way.
Linda was also a category 5 storm. We learned a lot from the history of it. We were at anchor but we learned that the strong winds would have killed every one of the people who were waiting at anchor for the storm. No boat and anchor system can withstand the winds and storm surge from a storm of that magnitude.
Patricia is worse. It is considered to be the strongest tropical storm on record. Patricia will kill Mexican people and non-Mexicans. There are thousands of non-Mexican people, and tens of thousands of Mexican people, who are at risk from this storm. None of them have seen a storm of this intensity.
Please pray for those who are exposed.
